column5: Waterfront Home, Great location! This townhome sets right on the water and is very comfortable for family vacations or corporate retreats. It is close to the beach, Schlitterbahn, and great fishing. 3 Bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms make this the perfect place for your next vacation! Newly remodeled with granite counter tops, tile, new furnishings and appliances. Everything you will need to make this a great vacation.
column8: Salt B Stay at Salt Cay, Fish from the Deck
